name: dr-zerquera-monorepo
description: Repo principal para la app de ZIMI, contiene el frontend y el backend.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
